data.description: Lowcountry living complete with a front porch for sipping sweet tea and spanish moss in the trees! This 4 bedroom home features a new roof installed 2020,4 new Hvac units, newly installed LVP throughout downstairs, new appliances, new counters, new deep sink, the entire interior freshly painted, smooth ceilings in living areas, and a beautiful corner lot. If you need lots of space and good storage-this home is perfect for you! There is lots of living area including a huge flex room downstairs that can be a game room/mancave/media room and another large flex room upstairs that would make a great exercise area. The formal living room could also be an office and the kitchen is open to a large family room with a fireplace.  Super location-Eagles Nest Elementary and River Oaks Middle are justaround the corner, Boeing, shopping, medical are all close by. This home was a former model home so there is heat/air in garage which was the office for the model home.
